overview: 2025 was defined by the convergence of agentic AI, geopolitical fracturing, climate tipping points, and bio-engineering breakthroughs.

key_themes.description: Transition from chatbots to systems that act autonomously. Major releases include GPT-5 (Aug), Gemini 3 (Nov), and the efficient DeepSeek models (Jan). Edge AI and the $100B 'Stargate' compute build-out redefine infrastructure.

US withdrawal from WHO and the Paris Agreement set an isolationist tone. Conflicts intensify between Israel-Iran, India-Pakistan, and in Ukraine as US aid pauses. Mass 'No Kings' protests erupt domestically in the US.
De-extinction milestones (Thylacine gestation, Dire Wolf pups) and the rise of AI-driven drug discovery (Manas AI, CavitOmiX).
The 1.5Â°C annual warming threshold is confirmed. Severe 'weather whiplash' yields fires, floods, typhoons, and unprecedented legal moves such as the ICJ climate liability ruling.
